name: The Legends of Gaia
description:
This is a one shot project. I used this game mostly to practice my scripting and parallax mapping. I used a few free tile set resources from other authors that provide free resources-

Avery, whtdragon, Pixanna and music by Youtuber - YouFulca.

My next goal is to practice my own art, as I've been becoming more familiar with photoshop.

I'll be making and using my own resources / MV's resources that came with the engine.

Thanks for reading this!
